item.description: Master the skills needed to bake fabulous pies with Tagan Engel, chef and creator of the New Haven Cooks cookbook. Learn new techniques and tricks while baking pies to donate to the Downtown Evening Soup Kitchen -- helping local families enjoy a full and tasty Thanksgiving meal. Leave with dough and recipes ready for your own Thanksgiving pies. $20 per family, space is limited. RSVP to rholcombe@commongroundct.org or call 203-389-4333 ext 1213.

group.name: New Haven Wine and Dining Meetup Group,

item.name: How To Be a Pie Ninja "Cooking Class For The Holidays & Help Feed The Homeless"
